distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for libreoffice fixes the following issues:

Libreoffice was updated to version 24.2.4.2:

- Release notes:

  * https://wiki.documentfoundation.org/Releases/24.2.1/RC1
  * https://wiki.documentfoundation.org/Releases/24.2.1/RC2

- Security issues fixed:

  * CVE-2024-3044: Fixed unchecked script execution in graphic on-click binding (bsc#1224279)

- Other issues fixed:

  * Fixed LibreOffice build failures with ICU 75 (bsc#1224309)

- Updated bundled dependencies:

  * curl version update from 8.6.0 to 8.7.1
  * gpgme version update from 1.20.0 to 1.23.2
  * libassuan version update from 2.5.6 to 2.5.7
  * libgpg-error version update from 1.47 to 1.48
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: Unchecked script execution in Graphic on-click binding in affected LibreOffice versions allows an attacker to create a document which without prompt will execute scripts built-into LibreOffice on clicking a graphic. Such scripts were previously deemed trusted but are now deemed untrusted.
notes.title: CVE description

recommended: SUSE Linux Enterprise Software Development Kit 12 SP5:libreoffice-sdk-24.2.4.2-48.59.3.x86_64
SUSE Linux Enterprise Workstation Extension 12 SP5:libreoffice-24.2.4.2-48.59.3.x86_64

remediations.details: To install this SUSE Security Update use the SUSE recommended installation methods like YaST online_update or "zypper patch".
